name: DIFAZ
label: Unsigned
bio:
DifaZ is the Techno side project by Fadi from the Dark Progressive duo Itchy & Scratchy.

it's been a longtime he wanted to come back to his roots as a Dj,
so he did and it's through a great selection of different kind of techno music such as Deep Techno, Industrial and Psytechno that he will make you explore the Depths of his MINDS !!

Let the Journey begin !!!

name: PHANATIC
label: Blue Tunes Records
bio:
Internationally acclaimed artist Phanatic is Kfir Lankry from the sunny Southern part of israel.
With a discography covering well over a decade, and after performing at festivals all over the world, Phanatic has become a mainstay in the worldwide Psychedelic Trance scene. He has been carefully watching the scene, and has re-crafted his unique sound for a new era - combining influences from Progressive and Full-On Psychedelic Trance with a new driving, aggressive, and techie twist. The result is something unlike anything else in the scene right now. With impeccably punchy and clear production, fresh stories and ideas, and a unique driving dance-floor vibe, Phanatic is poised to overtake dance floors around the globe. Look forward to a slew of new releases coming down the pipeline from Phanatic in the very near future!

name: ONE FUNCTION
label: Iono Music
bio:
Music has One Function â€“ To make you feel.
From the second the sound waves hit your body and soul it touches your nerves and transforms your senses. 
Where and how will that feeling take you in the sonic journey depends on your mood, personality and your surroundings. 
But it is that first contact point, that magical moment when you get hooked that set the rest of the tune.

This One Function, the first contact point will be facilitated by Jenia Akerman from Israel.
Akerman started his musical experimentation since he was 16 years old, playing in outdoor parties and quickly having the itch to make his own music. 
Influenced by inspirational artists such as The Delta, Cosma and Hallucinogen, Akerman decided to take his craft seriously and at the age of 19 went to BPM music School. 
Polishing his ideas and artistic identity, he released his first release in 2009 called Tropical Energy on Spliff Music. 
Exploring his abilities even further, in 2011 Jenia started his first solo project Unicode, a melodic and uplifting Progressive Trance fusion.
As Unicode, Akerman released his tunes in all the big labels such as Iboga, Blue Tunes, Spin Twist and Iono Music.

As Jeniaâ€™s project developed he decided to go back to his roots with Progressive Trance under the alias One Function.
In this project Akerman decided to focus more on spirituality, while combining oriental vocals and old school elements, which create his own unique psychedelic interpretation.
His first release as One Function â€“ Back to My Roots EP - was released in 2015 on Iono Music and received immediate attention across the world.
Supported by the biggest names in the Psytrance scene, from Protonica , John 00 Fleming , Egorythmia, Yahel and Guadium he is conquering the global sonic sphere. 
After playing in many indoor and outdoor events including: Australia, Swiss, Germany, Israel, France, Argentina, 
his path to your One Function is set.

name: ATACAMA
label: Digital Om
bio: Since their very first psytrance parties more than fifteen years back in time the Berliners Kevin Hentschel and Rafael Gomez never stopped experimenting with electronic sounds. Alongside multiple excursions into various sub-genres, ownlabel activities and many open air- and club events the two friends concentrate since 2012 on the production of drivingpsychedelic trance music. After some releases in Spain and further mindblowing experiences while playing large festivalsâ€“ such as the Fusion Festival â€“ the two musicians reinventedtheir sound â€“ and themselves â€“ as â€žAtacamaâ€œ.Sometimes mysterious, always complex and preferencialdriving Atacama carry off their listeners in spheres betweenbygone experiences and oncoming promises where mythsand reality, rhythm and movement merge into a cosmic unity

name: KOKMOK
label: Hadra Records
bio: Today DJ representing of the universe of Trance Progressive on the label Hadra Records and the time switch of the Hadra trance festival, Didier alias Kokmok originally arises from the techno scene and of the South of France. Key element in the development of the label Hadra and in the organization of the evenings Psymind, Kokmok will bring out its release first one in 2008; "Obsessiv Progressiv" is then the fruit of a collaboration with Echotek, Aerospace, Funky Dragon, Ovnimoon or still Ritmo. It is the beginning of the beautiful adventure which will drive him on the most beautiful European dance floor where Kokmok will confirm its style: bass prog and rhythms groovy in the appointment!!

name: MOMENTUM
label: SONIC LOOM MUSIC
bio:
Momentum is Aristides Katsinopoulos's solo project,
born and raised in Athens-Greece.
His first experiences with electronic music was at the early 2000's,
when he started following the music wave and collecting music from various electonic genres.
Ambient seems to satisfy his musical taste and starts exploring the depths of music production.
He, mainly, focuses on ambient & downtempo sounds,with deep atmospheric soundscapes and textures.
Aristides's musical proccess is always on progression in order to discover new paths of expression.
Side progects : 
Sygnals with Alex(R.I.P.) & Daoine Sidhe

name: SYGNALS
label: Sonic Loom
bio:
Signal: an electrical impulse or radio wave transmitted or received.
Converted to "Sygnals" due to the transmission through multiple brains ! 
A collaboration of Alexandros A.(R.I.P) , Aristides K. and Phoebus N.
Each one of them started producing music at the early 2000. Being friends for many years & having the need to create something unique, they decided to join forces. Tuning their different acoustic influences, combining music knowledge-creativity & fantasy, they formed Sygnals in 2007.
Their sole purpose is to produce cerebral music for inner & outer mind-journeys, throughout a fusion of chill-out, downbeat & atmospheric psychedelic soundscapes..!

name: DAOINE SIDHE
label: Sonic Loom
bio:
Phoebus was attracted by the music phenomenon in his early age. Always searching for deeper meanings in every music style, trying to realise the parameters of quality. 
His first touch with electronic music was in 1998 and ever since became a lover of this style and its later developments. 
In early 2000 he had already started making his own sounds with whatever equipment came in hand. After finishing his studies in music technology in 2007 he decided to really focus on what he likes best..making music !! 
That's the time he forms "Sygnals" with his good friends & partners Alex A.(R.I.P) & Aristides K. focused mainly in psychill & downtempo electronic sounds. The "Daoine Sidhe" project (sounds like Deenee Shee) is his approach in an experimental fusion of sounds from almost every electronic music style. 
Finally in "Dendrobates" project (literally means "the one who walks on trees") he focuses in the full power psychedelic era of sound. Naturally derived from the several years exploring the forests, in quest of imprinting natureâ€™s complex tones.
C u aRounD !!

name: MOBITEX
label: Altar Rec
bio:
Mobitex is an electronic music producer from Israel aka Eyal Markovich.His main style is Chillgressive psytance, which is a combination of psytance elements with chill and ambient music.Eyal is also a former member in the chillgressive music act Call Profondita with this act he released two full length albums - Ceil and Dracarys both  of them on Altar rec. Canada.

Last year he released his solo album as Mobitex - "the flow" also on altar rec.His live sets are define as a  psychedelic journiy which starts on low Bpm ( around 95 - 100 ) and ends in higher Bpm ( around 115-120) . His sets including  his discogrephy and new unreleased tracks and live synth which are added live throughout his sets.

Involved in Hadra since 2008 as general manager and musical programmer for the Hadra Trance Festival, BenoÃ®t stepped into the limelight of the stage in 2016 with a DJ project named Benzinho. Carrying on with his role of programmer, he proposes a journey in the depths of psydub, funk and glitch international scene featuring artists from Merkaba Music, Shanti Planti or Maia Brasil Records. name: MISS TICK
label: NCTRN Records
bio:
Bio :
Pioneer of the hip-hip movement, she has discovered techno music in 1999. Events organizer for the Batofar and during rave parties where she becomes an enthusiastic activist of this musical style. After being a part of some labels such as Spin Twist, Miss Tick first joins Bus Records and then create her own Techno Label : NCTRN Records (Nocturne records). She now plays on the international scene : Europe, Australia, Asia and Big Festivals as Ozora, Modem Festival, Infamous Armada, Experience ...
Miss Tick loves playing techno sets, a bit tribal with a touch of glamourous ; a style that rocks and rolls !

name: AUDIOFLOW
label: NCTRN
bio:
By the age of 14, Audioflow already owned his first machine, a Groovebox. Straight off, he made his way playing at rave parties spreading his music through out France and nearby countries. In 2010, he took his machines off to China for the Electronic World Festival tour, sharing the stage with Li Daiguo, a traditional chinese musician. Since then, his voracious appetite for live techno performance and producing has been unquenchable. Discovering Audioflow live is like getting caught in a mysterious science fiction web: it's dark and futuristic as well as melodious and luminous. He carries you away into his world with his atmospheric liveset, enchanting and bursting with creativity.
Currently on the following record labels: NCTRN Recods, Maison Des Musiques Alternatives, Toolbox records, Pain Beurre record, his last live was passed entirely under the press for a double vinyl on Toolbox records.
He has shared the stage with: Extrawelt, Perfect Stranger, Groove Delight, Alex Stein,            A Skillz, Mollono Bass, Be Svendsen, Meat Katie, Khainz, Manel Diaz, Broken Note, Odjbox, Crystal Distortion, 69 db, Ixi, Jeff 23...

name: FLOATING MACHINE
label: Electrik Dream
bio: Floating Machine is AntÃ³nio LourenÃ§o, from Coimbra â€“ Portugal. Since very young he felt in love with music. Learned and played regularly many instruments like guitar, piano or saxophone and took part in various experimental projects in distinct areas like jazz, hip-hop or punk rock. Later, influenced by the electronic music magic, he started to DJ, exploring all its diversity, from downtempo to dance sonorities like acid jazz, nu-jazz, dub, breakbeat or deep house... Naturally, this leads to electronic music production, applying all his influences in a techno and progressive context and also leaning deeply into the palette of ambient experimental sounds. Performed in countless events and big international festivals such as Boom Festival, Freedom Festival, Zna Gathering, Shankra, among others, and you can find his music on Digital Diamonds, Techgnosis, Mindspring and his "home", Blind Arc. AntÃ³nio is also one-half of Code Therapy, an ascending progressive techno act. A person without many words, he uses music to connect and communicate, taking the listener to adventurous and unpredictable aural journeys.

name: LAND SWITCHER
label: Shanti Planti
bio: Land Switcher is a new force in Psydub, bringing a fresh and exciting sound that melds Reggae influences and organic samples with the futuristic intensity of Psytrance and the massive bass roars of Dubstep. Liquid, mutating beasts squish, swoop and stomp over driving percussion, conjuring radioactive swamplands filled with suspense, mystery and adventure. It is a meeting of ancient and future, of organic and synthetic, of peace and brutality, evoking the spectrum of emotions between.

name: ISANTROPIA
label: SquareLab Music
bio:
Isantropia is the duo psytechno project run bye Djane Mademoiselle Vitale and Synthetik chaos, owners of Squarelab music. This project explore different type of music and mix the influences of this duo in music and in the life.

Isantropia est le projet duo psytechno gÃ©rÃ© par Djane Mademoiselle Vitale et Synthetik chaos, propriÃ©taires de la musique de Squarelab. Ce projet explore diffÃ©rents types de musique et mÃ©lange les influences de ce duo dans la musique et dans la vie.

She has played in many countries around the globe in both large festivals and intimate gatherings, and travels frequently to seek out new venues in order to spread the vibe and awaken inspirations within.
Recently, Mademoiselle Vitale has bridged even more gaps by incorporating artist in her sets from the Purple Hexagon label to add a deep layer of dance floor surprises.
With refreshing sound, beautiful sights and a steadfast energy to unite all through music, Mademoiselle Vitale is dedicated to creating an atmosphere for us to share through dance and sound. Passionate imagination, crystal vision, and vibrant emotions are very important to her and are certainly felt in her selections - a true reflection of her spirit.

name: AIRI
label: Zenon Records
bio: Airi is Felix A., a half Swiss/Japanese producer, currently residing in Lausanne, Switzerland. Having worked with electronic music since 2004, he has found a real passion in his expression through psychedelic music. He has had a musical education and has been a violinist since his childhood, as which he also used to play in the orchestra. Over the years he has developed his very own remarkable style of music, characterized by expressive sound design, massive basses and thoughtful atmospheres. Having rocked countless international dance floors, he never ceases to surprise his public with his powerful and intelligent signature sound. Watch out for this artist since he will keep innovating the genre for years to come.

name: GUMNUT
label: Kinematic Records
bio: Gumnut is the sonic incarnation of Sydney producer Jack Layard, who burst onto the psy-scene in 2016 with his debut release â€˜Nuts and Boltsâ€™ on Kinematic Records. Jack brings his years of experience as a bass player and guitarist to the table, frequently incorporating organic instrumentation infused with glitchy psychedelic sound design. Gumnutâ€™s sound, influenced by a range of genres including jazz, funk, rock and blues, is a unique fusion of melodic grooves and bouncy basslines, packed with a tonne of live instrumentation. Intelligent progressive psytrance that transcends boundaries and limitations, oozing a positive frequency evocative of afternoon stomps in the Australian bush!

name: HYPOGEO
label: Zenon Records
bio:
HypoGeo is "Anything that originates, grows and evolves beneath the earth".

The description perfectly fits the music: deep, obscure, hypnotic, mental, filthy and psychedelic. 

It takes shades through the producer's musical background: orchestrated by extreme metal, industrial & EBM, New Wave, Noise, techno, IDM & dark ambient. 

May 2012 marked the inception of HypoGeo's introduction to the wider world of music. The first full-length album "Tree of Lies" was released on Zenon records - the infamous Australian psychedelic label. 
The album was a huge success for the particularly aggressive and heavy sound, building the bridge between the deepest of psychedelic trance textures, some call it "forest" and the ultimate â€œZenonesqueâ€ sound. 
No matter what the title, the awe of experiencing a live Hypo-performance is second to none, anywhere around the globe. 

Currently, HypoGeo is working on the long awaited 2nd studio album; an epitome of creativity, abstract sonic landscapes, and undeniably intricate composition.

name: VICIOUS CACTUS

bio:
VICIOUS CACTUS (FRENCH)

Vicious Cactus est le projet de musique psychÃ©dÃ©lique de Vincent T. crÃ©Ã© en 2015.
Ce projet rassemble plusieurs cultures : la Techno, la Dark Progressive Trance et le Hip Hop / Bass Music.

NÃ© dans le nord-est de la France, Ã  la frontiÃ¨re de lâ€™Allemagne, de la Belgique & du Luxembourg, Vincent prend goÃ»t Ã  la musique Ã©lectronique en assistant Ã  un concert de Noisia, le pionnier de la Drum and Bass, dans un festival, Ã  Nancy.

En 2005, Vincent reÃ§oit ses premiÃ¨res machines. Un synthÃ©tiseur et une boÃ®te Ã  rythme Korg Electribe. Il fait son premier pas dans la crÃ©ation musicale en sâ€™inspirant de la DnB pour ses compositions. Puis en 2008, il fait sa premiÃ¨re prestation Ã  la fÃªte de fin dâ€™annÃ©e du lycÃ©e dâ€™art.

En 2011, Vincent commence le mix en faisant principalement de la DnB. Il commence la Progressive Trance en 2012 , peu avant la crÃ©ation du crew Â« Namek Sound Ravâ€™olution Â» dont il est le vice-prÃ©sident. Le Crew doublÃ© dâ€™un Sound System est centrÃ© sur la culture psychÃ©dÃ©lique.

En 2015, Vincent commence la production musicale sur ordinateur. Quelques mois plus tard, Insonitus Records lui propose dâ€™intÃ©grer le label basÃ© en Angleterre. Depuis cette date, Vincent a installÃ© son studio traitÃ© acoustiquement. Il a jouÃ© une trentaine de fois son projet Dark-Prog. 5 releases sur ces 3 ans dont une pour le Hadra Festival oÃ¹ Vincent va jouer en 2018. Reconnaissant dâ€™avoir pu Ã©tendre ses performances, au-delÃ  du grand Est de la France, au Luxembourg, Ã  la Belgique, Ã  la NorvÃ¨ge et Ã  la Suisse.


Vincent a crÃ©Ã© son propre style Ã  la sauce psychÃ©dÃ©lique et organique. Ayant diverses influences dans le monde musical, il vous fait rentrer dans son univers, mÃ©langeant des gros rythmes groovys, des sonoritÃ©s mentales et psychiques tout en gardant des touches de la musique prÃ©-techno.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
VICIOUS CACTUS (ENGLISH)

Vicious Cactus is Vincent T.â€™s psychedelic music project created in 2015.
This projects brings together several cultures : Techno, Dark Progressive Trance and Hip-Hop / Bass Music.

Born in the Northeast of France, at the border between France, Germany, Belgium and Luxembourg, Vincent discovers a taste for electronic music while attending to a concert of Noisia, the pioneer of Drum & Bass, at a festival in Nancy.

In 2005, Vincent receives his first machines. A synthesizer and a Korg Electribe drum machine. His first step in musical creation is inspired in its composition by DnB. Then, in 2008 comes his first performance at the end of year party of the Art high school.

In 2011, Vincent starts to get into mixing, making mostly DnB. He tackles Progressive Trance in 2012, shortly before the creation of the â€œ Namek Sound RAVâ€™olution â€œ crew, where he acts as vice-president. The Crew, coupled with a Sound System, is centered around psychedelic culture.

In 2015, Vincent starts computer-assisted music production. Some months later, Insonitus Records offers him to join the England-based label. Since then, Vincent has installed his acoustically-treated studio, and played his Dark-Prog project thirty times. 5 releases these three last years, including the one for Hadra Festival, where Vicious Cactus is invited to play at the 2018 edition. Lucky enough to have been able to extend his performances beyond the great East of France, to Luxembourg, Belgium, Norway and Switzerland.


Vincent created his own style, with a psychedelic and organic feel. Having diverse influences from around the musical world, he gets you introduced to his Universe, mixing fat, groovy rhythms to mental and psychic sonorities while still hinting at pre-techno music.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------

name: ONE ARC DEGREE
label: SYNPHAERA RECORDS
bio: Greek producers Vasilis Kesalidis and Ioannis Konstantios started One Arc Degree with the intent to explore how music can trigger different emotional responses and memories, and then channel those evocations back into the music itself in a continuous cycle of discovery and renewal. Their discography as One Arc Degree span a wide range of music labels, such as Synphaera, Blue Tunes, Iboga, Ultimae and Morphosis Records, to name a few. Currently on their 3rd LP -after a constant stream of releases this decade- OAD show no signs of slowing down anytime soon.

name: DIRTY SAFFI
label: Bom Shanka Music
bio: High grade psychedelic dance music.â€¨ Dirty Saffi is Al from Psymmetrix and DJ Nuky; one is a production monkey the other a DJ, which makes for great combination of understanding of how to make a well structured track and what it should sound like. They have been playing their project in many countries and many of the biggest festivals, as well as countless underground parties where their high energy live set ensures that the dancefloor rocks and no one leaves without a smile on their face. They are now finishing their new album  that will be released before the end of the year. Keep connected!

name: PSYMMETRIX
label: Bom Shanka Music
bio: Based in the UK, Al and Richie Psymmetrix have been deeply immersed in the global psychedelic music scene for a combined total of over 25 years as DJ's, producers, label owners & party promoters. Firmly established in the psychedelic underground they have released 4 albums on Bom Shanka Music and amassed an impressive back catalogue and an ever growing list of past performances, having released over 35 tracks across 8 different labels & played at all the major festivals and parties and many smaller events in the UK, across Europe, Asia, South Africa, Australia and the Americas.

name: TSUBI
label: Sangoma Records
bio:
Tsubi has been an active member of the Hungarian psy scene since the 2000â€™s. He has been a resident DJ of the Avatar party series since the very beginning and also at O.Z.O.R.A. Festival, where he also plays a big role in program organizing and managing the festivalâ€™s web radio. In the past years he has played at all the noteworthy local psytrance events, in many European countries, and has also been invited to perform in Japan, India, Israel and Brazil. From the mega summer festivals besides O.Z.O.R.A. he has blasted the dancefloors of Boom, Sonica, Glade, Full Moon and S.U.N. festivals too.

More recently, he and Dr Space have launched their own party series, Labirhythm, presenting the artists and music that stand close to their heart to the Budapest audience.

In regards to his style, Tsubi is able to move among a really wide spectrum of sounds, he is relentless (and unwavering) in his search for the most contemporary soundscapes and the most unique tracks. With his two other projects, TSB and Tsu, his focus is on downtempo and techno, respectively.

name: ALTA
label: Zero1
bio:
Alta is the solo project of alastair crowther the man behind psymmetrix/dirty saffi and the co-founder of bom shanka music. 

With Alta he pushes the boundaries of what is 'day time trance' making a solid set that has its feet well and truly in the sound of Zero1 Music but with that special dark twist that only someone behind the blasting sounds of dirty saffi can pull off.

Over 2 years in the making, Alta has tried to forge a link between daytime and night time, and no its not twilight, its just rocking psychedelic dance music. 'daytime with balls' is how he likes to describe it, you could call it proper  clean rocking shit. music for your mind and body.

name: NAIMA
label: Sangoma Records
bio:
Sarah Naima grew up in an old hippi environment and extraordinary musical family, these love and sensitivity for the music came quite early in her life.
Already at the age of 6 she started playing keyboard and since then her passion for music grew steady.

In the year 1996 she came in touch with electronic music for the first time.
Since then she has been following many different styles in the electronic scene with big enthusiasm until she made the experience of a Psychedelic- Trance Party in the year 2003.

She was instantly hooked with this scene and she fell deeply in love with the music, the energy and all these inspiring, magical places and people surrounding her.

Naima started her journey as a DJ seriously 2009, in her sets she symbolize psychedelic sounds, mystical & powerful deep tunes for colourful nights or energetic mornings.

The style and the kind of music she chooses for her Sets depends on the atmosphere and energy around but also on the setting and at which time she plays.

During the last years Naima grew as an international DJ,and she has performed on various international Parties and some of the best Festivals all around the world like Ozora Festival - Hungary,Experience - Thailand, Midnightsun Festival - Norway, MoDem - Croatia, Antaris, Freqs of Nature, Waldfrieden,VuuV - Festival - Germany, Blackmoon Festival -Italy, Solstice Festival - Netherlands, Transahara - Marocco, One Love - Switzerland, Kosmos Festival - Finnland,Yaga Gathering - Lithuania, Galaxy Evolution Festival - India,Belantara - Malaysia,Spiritual Ritual Festival- Nepal.

So far she played in: 
Australia, Austria,Brazil, Belgium, Canada,Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland,France,Germany, Greece, Hungary, India, Italy,Mexico,Malaysia,Malta,Macedonia,Nepal,UK; Netherlands, Norway, Lithuania Portugal, Poland, Romania, Russia,United Emirates,Spain,Sweden,Switzerland,Slowenia, Slovakia,Thailand, Turkey.

name: GINA
label: Hadra Records
bio:
"Always passionate about music, I had the chance to grow up in an manifold musical universe.
The abundance of the different styles and the possibilitys to combine them, pushed and motivated me to create mixes since 2011 in the style psygressive/ darkprog.

Listen to the story and allow you on the dancefloor to release all your energy!"
*********************************************

"Gina grandie dans un univers musical trÃ¨s variÃ©. PassionnÃ©e de musique depuis toujours 
elle dÃ©couvre le mouvement trance et elle est trÃ¨s vite fascinÃ©e.

La richesse des diffÃ©rents styles musicaux et les possibilitÃ©s de les combiner la pousse

Ses mix dynamiques et atmosphÃ©riques racontent une histoire riche en facettes, 
qui permet au dance floor de dÃ©gager toute son Ã©nergie.

name: ITCHY & SCRATCHY
label: Hadra Records
bio:
Toinan (Scratchy) et Fadi (Itchy)

Deeply inspired by both techno and psytrance, Itchy & Scratchyâ€™s debut album, Unsuccessful Escape, is a firmly dark and rhythmical hybrid blend that takes the listener into a musical and mental trip oscillating between dark prog and forest trance! Definitely not for the faint-hearted!

You will explore the unexplorable !
===================================
Toinan (Scratchy) &  Fadi (Itchy)

De la bass music Ã  la techno, Itchy & Scratchy n'ont pas cessÃ© de faire Ã©voluer leur style. 
Ils finalisent aujourd'hui leur premier album chez Hadra records.

InspirÃ©s par l'univers de la Dark Progressive et celui de la Forest, leur live vous plonge dans un voyage cosmique Ã  multiples rebondissements.

A contre courant de la Progressive lumineuse, ils ont cherchÃ© du cotÃ© d'un son noir, groovy, malicieux, sans concession et qui ne cesse d'Ã©voluer.

Just feel the power !

name: CEZZERS
label: Solartech Records
bio:
There are many Colors in the spectrum , And CeZZers LOVE them all.
To choose one would be too difficult a task for them. 

CeZZers are Arye Siluk & Ran Shalev.
A Psychedelic Electronic music duo from Israel 
Formed in 2012, The project has preformed on many stages
all around the world , from the most underground raves to the
the biggest Psychedelic festivals.  
They are Best known for their unique style called "Hybrid Psytrance" 
which fuses between a wide range of elements from the 
Psytrance music world.

Their Creation is purely mood based...
Without any boundaries or limitations ,they take everything
that has gathered in their subconscious minds 
and spill it out into their tunes.
Taking huge inspiration from the Cinematic music world,
CeZZers have totally embraced the approach of Sound Design.

In Addition to their Psy-Trance creations...
CeZZers have developed a new form of Psychedelic Live-Show which 
focuses more on their capabilities as Live musicians.
The Concept of the Live-Show is that every sound and musical part
is played, recorded and looped in Real time using live instruments
such as Guitars , Synthesizers, Percussive Instruments and many other 
organic sources of sound.

name: ONKEL DUNKEL
label: Parvati Records
bio:
Onkel Dunkel is the musical alter ego of Monno, producer, mastering engineer, synth lover and sound designer. Born and raised in Denmark, he has been involved with music one way or another since his late teens. First as a bass player at the age of 17, but the introduction to Psychedelic Trance lead to him ditching his bass and getting into computers and synthesizers. Fast forward a couple of years and the project Grapes of Wrath was born. Together with his partner in crime Jaffa they were on a mission to make harder edged music than most were doing at the time. This culminated in the seminal split album with Meteloids: â€œTits on Fireâ€ Released on Parvati Records in 2004 and considered a milestone release for that label. Since 2006 Monno has mainly released music as Onkel Dunkel and his second album â€œConnectionsâ€ Was released in June 2017. Comprised of only tracks with friends that came for a visit in the studio, itÂ´s a mix of influences spanning far and wide. 

After a busy winter he is now back in the studio working on new material to keep your synapses firing at maximum. 

Best enjoyed loud in mild climates, no expiry date.

name: MANU
label: Hadra
bio:
Investi dans l'association Hadra depuis plus de 10 ans, Manu a intÃ©grÃ© son label comme DJ dÃ¨s 2008. 
RÃ©solument orientÃ© vers la face sombre d'Hadra Records, il partage rÃ©guliÃ¨rement la scÃ¨ne en versus avec Shotu, par ailleurs binÃ´me de choix pour la sortie en 2011 sur le label de la compilation Twisted Vision #3. Manu s'attache Ã  promouvoir via des DJ Sets exceptionnels la scÃ¨ne psyche dark internationale avec un faible non dissimulÃ© pour les artistes de Parvati et Wildthings !

name: CUBIC SPLINE

bio:
PassionnÃ© par la synthÃ¨se sonore, Cubic Spline trouve son unicitÃ© dans les atmosphÃ¨res trÃ¨s travaillÃ©es et les textures sonores dÃ©routantes, avec un penchant tout particulier pour les ambiances mÃ©lancoliques.
AprÃ¨s un premier album Â« Paradigm Shift Â» sorti en 2012 sur Hadra Records et Â« Oxymora Â» en 2015, suite logique et attendue du premier opus, il prÃ©pare son deuxiÃ¨me EP pour la fin 2017. Cubic Spline nous transporte dans un univers de clairÂ­obscur orchestral qui captive inÃ©vitablement son auditoire !

Fascinated by sound synthesis, Cubic Spline finds his uniqueness in very elaborated atmospheres and by puzzling sound textures, with a quite particular tendency for melancholic atmospheres.
After his first album â€˜Paradigm Shiftâ€™, out in 2012 on Hadra Records and â€˜Oxymoraâ€™ in 2015, result logical and expected from the first opus, heâ€™s preparing his second EP for the end of 2017.
Cubic Spline transports us in a universe of orchestral twilight which captivates inevitably his public.

name: EKAOLOGIK
label: HADRA ALTER VISION
bio:
EkaOlogik est un duo live composÃ© de Patrick ABOS et Yoanna NICOLA.
Issus d'une formation trip hop , les deux artistes crÃ©ent aujourd'hui une musique down tempo psybient, mÃ©lange subtil de leurs influences shoegaze, trance, dub, post rock et new age.
Leur live, hypnotique et aÃ©rien, vous emmÃ¨ne dans un univers sonore ou les rythmes progressifs dansent avec de fines mÃ©lodies, enveloppÃ©es par des nappes souvent saturÃ©es. Association de sons synthÃ©tiques et de lignes acoustiques, quâ€™il crÃ©ent eux-mÃªme (chants, flÃ»te, guitare, violon).
Le projet a vu le jour en 2009 et a jouÃ© son premier live Ã  l'occasion du festival ambiant Ambiosonic. Il sâ€™agit Ã  ce moment dâ€™un live pur machine, hardware (MC 909).
Puis en 2013 , les Â« ekaO Â» commencent Ã  sâ€™intÃ©resser Ã  la technique de production MAO, en composant des titres toujours ambient.
A partir de 2015, les crÃ©ations sâ€™intensifient aboutissant en 2016 sur un set live psybient. Depuis le dÃ©but, ekaOlogik s'est produit sur diffÃ©rentes scÃ¨nes et festivals (Ambiosonic Festival , Hadra Trance festival, Harmonic Festival, Eclectic, Equinoxe, Magic Castle, The psychedelic box, work in progress Transubtil...) .
Ils figurent dans les compilations : Hadracadabra 5, Turlitava 2 et Chiling Dragon Tales.
Leur album psybient "Light Seeds" sorti en 2017 sous le label Hadra Altervision Records, est suivi d'un ep digital "Perseida" qui sort au printemps 2018 Ã©galement sous ce label.




EkaOlogik is a live duet composed of Patrick ABOS and Yoanna NICOLA. From a trip hop band, the two artists today create a psybient down tempo music, subtle blend of their shoegaze, trance, dub, post rock and new age influences. Their live, hypnotic and aerial, takes you into a world of sound or progressive rhythms dance with fine melodies, wrapped by sounds often saturated. A combination of synthetic sounds and acoustic lines, which they create themself (voices, flute, guitar, violin). The project was born in 2009 and played its first live at Ambiosonic Ambient Festival. It is at this moment a live pure machine, hardware (MC 909).Then in 2013, the "ekaO" begin to take an interest in the MAO production technique, composing always ambient songs. From 2015, the creations intensify culminating in 2016 on a psybient live set. From the beginning, ekaOlogik has performed on different stages and festivals (Ambiosonic Festival, Hadra Trance festival, Harmonic Festival, Eclectic, Equinox, Magic Castle, The psychedelic box, Transubtil work in progress ...). They appear in compilations: Hadracadabra 5, Turlitava 2 and Chiling Dragon Tales. Their psybient album "Light Seeds" released in 2017 under the label Hadra Altervision Records, is followed by a digital ep "Perseida" which comes out in spring 2018 also under this label.

name: SLEEPING FOREST
label: Hadra-Altervision
bio: Sleeping Forest, artiste du label AlterVision, auteur de l'album "Rise of Nature" sorti en 2013 sur Hadra Records, viendra vous prÃ©senter entre autre des morceaux inÃ©dits qui composeront son second Opus dont la sortie est prÃ©vu dÃ©but 2019. FidÃ¨le Ã  ses thÃ¨mes de prÃ©dilections, les ambiances trÃ¨s nature, les rythmiques variÃ©es et les mÃ©lodies envoutantes seront prÃ©sents.

name: INVISIBLE RALF
label: Melusine Records
bio:
Invisible Ralf:
Ralf was born in the year 1989 in Nijmegen, The Netherlands.
At the age of 10 he started to play the guitar which started the fascination for making music. After his high school he decided to study electronic music. He did two studies in 8 years and finished with a bachelor degree in 2016 as a composer at HKU, Utrecht. He has composed and released various styles of music with different aliases. He also did live electronics and DJing for more than a decade. Ambient and Psybient has become one of his favorite genres to compose. Next to composing autonomic music, Ralf also composes and performs for theatre, dance and film.

name: NEURONOD
label: Glitchy Tonic Records / Atomes
bio:
Neuronod est un Producer et Dj basÃ© Ã  Paris.
AprÃ¨s des annÃ©es Ã  mixer de multiples genres tels que la Drum&Bass, le Techno ou encore la DarkProg, il commenÃ§a finalement Ã  produire sa propre musique en 2013.

En tant que Dj, il a toujours Ã©tÃ© attirÃ© par les tracks aux ambiances deep et atmosphÃ©riques avec une touche de psychÃ©dÃ©lisme. Il regroupe dorÃ©navant ces diffÃ©rentes Ã©nergies et influences dans ses productions que l'on peut qualifier de Psygressive ou DarkProg.

ReprÃ©sentant du label Allemand "Glitchy Tonic Records" et membre de l'association parisienne "Atomes" , il s'exprime aussi derniÃ¨rement via son side project Darkprog en duo appelÃ© "Neurolabz".

Neuronod is a French Producer and Dj based in Paris.
After years of Djing multiple genres like Drum&Bass, Techno and Dark Prog, he finally started producing his own music in 2013. 

As a Dj, he always been attracted by bass-oriented tracks with deep and atmospheric ambiances and a hint of psychedelia, now bringing together those different energies and influences in his own productions that you could describe as "Dark Prog" or "Psygressive".

Label Dj for Glitchy Tonic Records and member of the parisian association "Atomes", he also express himself through his fresh duo side project with his very good friend Naolabz which is called Neurolabz, also focusing on twisted dark prog!

name: BOOM SHANKAR
label: BMSS Records
bio:
German based Boom Shankar is a Dj for Psychedelic Trance, the label manager
of BMSS Records and an event promoter within Europe. Having been initiated
into the Goa Trance scene in the early Nineties and by traveling the globe ever
since, his sets are a mirror of the constant melting pot of fundamental
Psytrance characteristics.

Whether he is guiding the dance floor through the night or into the morning,
the outcome is always a voyage filled with a depth and an energy that allows
the crowd to feel a sense of freedom through Trance. Groovy, deep, mature,
hypnotic and clearly distinguishable.

Having played at many underground & major events worldwide, he has
developed a full understanding of the flow and the energies of each dance floor
and is flexible in terms of "styles".

Through his impromptu sets, he is able to interact personally with each dance
floor, taking the audience on a trans-formative journey. His sets are a direct
form of communication through music.

Besides this, Boom Shankar is the label manager of BMSS Records where he
has released 8 best-selling compilations so far:

Transmissions, Transition, Cosmic Connections, Trancendance and Trancefusion
feat. artists such as Aes Dana, Braincell, Tristan, Sonic Species & Avalon, Eat
Static, Pogo, Lucas & Mechanimal, Egorythmia, Ovnimoon, Touch Tone,
Audioform, Headroom & Zen Mechanics, Entheoegenic, Talpa, Martian Arts,
Outsiders, ManMadeMan and many more.

He is working on his ninth one which will probably see the light in spring of
2018.

In addition, Boom Shankar is part of the S.U.N. Festival crew in Hungary, the
Alice im Wummerland party series in Germany plus is involved in many other
global productions.

name: RADZY
label: BMSS RECORDS
bio: RADZY is a Psychedelic Trance DJ & Promoter from Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. He is the co-founder and organizer of Epic Tribe, Malaysia`s Psychedelic Trance collective family that has been promoting and hosting psychedelic trance music & arts culture in Kuala Lumpur since early 2006. RADZY is the co-organizer and cofounder of Belantara Gathering, Malaysia`s annual international psychedelic music & arts festival.RADZY 's DJ Sets has been described to have a versatile day or night time style with always a full dose of crystal clean psychedelic sound in his mix, but always keeping it original with a truly Malaysian style.

name: KABAYUN
label: Sangoma Records
bio:
Kabayun is the project of David Mostoller, a psytrance producer from the United States. After spending many years honing his sound, performing around the USA, and organizing parties in New York City, David has spent the last 5 years touring the globe, performing in many European cities, in North and Central America, Asia, India and Australia, and at many of the top summer festivals in Europe, including Ozora, MoDem, Antaris, Summer and many more....

After releasing his debut album on 2to6 Records in 2011, in 2012 David joined the team at Looney Moon Records, based in Italy. In 2015 he joined Sangoma Records, a label based in Germany that promotes psytrance without genre boundaries, which is a perfect fit for his music, which floats in the border zone between twilight, forest, and dark, pulling elements from each, for a full power, psychedelic and very danceable vibe. 

His tracks have been featured on many compilations and releases from top psytrance labels over the years, currently David is working on a ton of new music, including a new EP and an upcoming album on Sangoma Records, as well as many collaborations with some of his favorite artists and friends in the scene.

Now residing in Philadelphia, PA, USA, Kabayun is available for bookings worldwide.

Kabayunâ€™s music intends to create an environment that stimulates the listener to release themselves from the trials of everyday life and confront their challenges through the trance dance experience. Channeling the spirit of the west, Kabayun pulls together many elements to create an intensely psychedelic experience that lifts the body and the mind to undiscovered plateausâ€¦.

name: KABADROP
label: Sangoma Records / Harmonia Records
bio:
KabaDrop is a collaboration from David (Kabayun) and Mike (Ridden / Drip Drop).

The project began after the two met in Goa this past year. They played after each other at a party at 9 Bar in Vagator Beach, and from there the connection was born.

Since their meeting in Goa, the two have continued to work on music, meeting numerous times in Mike's studio in Athens, Greece. 

The style of their music is a reflection of their experiences in Goa. Neither dark nor light, the music is a high energy liquid sound, with deep soundscapes, twisted leads, dark melodies and a focus on clean production.

name: DRIP DROP
label: HARMONIA
bio: Behind Drip Drop is Michail Chavales , a 34 years old Greek born in Athens in 1983. Michael's interest in electronic music started in the early 90s.He slowly started producing music in 2005 while he is studying sound engineering in SAE institute and in 2009 he joined Harmonia rec family and  makes his first release under the project Ridden . Meanwhile and after performing in events around the world  the idea of Drip Drop was born and immediately Michael started to  work on these new basis. In 2014 the  Drip Drop Album was released from Harmonia, by knowing big success in most of the dance-floors worldwide. Since then, and after participating in some of the biggest festivals around the globe  and releasing quite enough tracks for VAâ€™s and compilations  , for 2018  Michael  is going to present you the new adventure  â€œDrip Drop in Lost Cityâ€, the second full album of Drip Drop coming soon from Harmonia Records .Stay tuned for more and donâ€™t forget 2 â€œdropâ€â€¦...

name: MAD TRIBE
label: TIP Records
bio:
MAD TRIBE is a collaboration between SPACE TRIBE & MAD MAXX (Olli Wisdom & Max Peterson). They started making music together in 2005 clicking immediately with a shared vision for a full power psychedelic sound with twisted sense of humour. MAD TRIBE received fantastic response to their first album â€SPACED OUTâ€ on TIP records 2015, Bringing a juicy psychedelic experience, guaranteed to spark all 6 senses. In 2016 Mad Tribe released Tuned in Perfectly, Alien Hoax & The LSD party EPs & a stunning vinyl picture disc. In June 2017 Mad Tribe released a UFO shaped vinyl â€œOut of this Worldâ€ followed by a new hit album â€œAmazing tales from Outer Spaceâ€ 
A new MAD TRIBE record â€“ PLANET GONE MAD / ROCKET POWER  will be released on TIP records as a double A side glow in the dark vinyl & digital download in March 2018
Mad Tribe are visiting this planet somewhere near you, so prepare for abduction! 
Mad Tribeâ€¦ You donâ€™t have to be Mad, Butâ€¦

name: MAD MAX
label: United Beats
bio: MAD MAXX is the result of years of hard work, perfecting a unique sound, embodying all the travels, experiences and parties of the past 20 years. The music is a mix of trance, ethnicÂ and deep sounds, with a strong kick and ominous bass line, an electro touch, emotional chants, and at times nostalgic atmospheres, with a BPM ranging from 138 to 145 in general. All of this sonic mayhem delivered in a whirlwind of psychedelia of course....

name: SPACE TRIBE
label: Space Tribe Music
bio:
Olli Wisdom is the man behind the psychedelic phenomenon that is Space Tribe and its more than just music. Olli has been a pioneer of Psychedelic Trance for many years & Space Tribe is one of the most well known names in the psychedelic scene thanks to his incredible energy & music. For over 20 years heâ€™s been globe trotting in his unique style â€“ delivering mind bending, full power psychedelic music & raising clouds of dust
In 1993, Olli, his brother Miki, and fellow space cadet, Richmond, started Space Tribe clothing in Bali. The fractal fluoro party gear was an instant success, and now you can see it at parties all over the planet.
In 1995, the first Space Tribe tracks were hatched in the Butterfly studios with Simon Posford (Hallucinogen/Sphongle), and everything flowed from there. Space Tribe released the first album, 'Sonic Mandala' on Spirit Zone in 1996. In 2004 Space Tribe Music was set up as a record label providing an outlet for Space Tribe releases & compilation albums. Space Tribe are also making many tracks in collaboration with other artists â€“ Mad Maxx, GMS (Alien Jesus), X-Dream, Electric Universe (ESP), Tristan, Dick Trevor (Green Nunâ€™s of the Revolution) . Jon Klein (Specimen, Siouxsie & the Banshees,) has also been bringing his sublime guitar skills to Space Tribe live shows & in the studio. Today, Space Tribe continue to travel all over the world, playing live at parties and bringing joy to the thousands of dancers who know exactly why they are there. Space Tribe parties have lifted the spirit and tweaked the synapses all over the planet from Burning Man to Ozora, from the mountains in Japan to the beach in Goa..Next party?
Maybe on Sirius B?

name: ANIMALIEN
label: PURPLE HEXAGON RECORDS / BELIEVE LAB RECORDS
bio:
ANIMALIEN

Originated in Mexico from the sound lab of Mariano Tur after many years of experimenting with different projects and types of music which led him to bring this sound creature to life. A growling psychedelic twilight sound Inspired by the organic life forms in different planetary environments and the higher dimensional entities which affect the evolution of life and consciousness in mysterious ways

name: ANTONYMOUS
label: SONIC LOOM MUSIC
bio:
Antonymous

is an artist from Athens, Greece.
He took his first steps in studying music at an early age in a private conservatory, where he took
piano lessons and practiced with different harmonium keyboards.
Around 2000, psytrance caught his attention and after many years of following the scene,
playing DJ sets and experimenting his own ideas in various genres, the project was born.
His first tracks as well as his debut EP â€œThe Ascending Pathâ€ were released by Sonic Loom
Music.
Since then he has performed in many festivals all over the world such MoDem, Freqs of Nature,
Earth Dance & Ritual and has released tracks with major labels of the scene.
In the meantime together with Tromo they have created the side project Quadraphonic.
Antonymous is constantly exploring the psychedelic sound which aims to take the listener on a
journey where body nâ€™ mind will follow and his currently working on releasing his personal
Album.

name: SPIRIT ARCHITECT
label: Dacru Records
bio:
Making music is about challenging your brain... becoming complex... being complex. Spirit Architect is a psychedelic trance act by Angel Zdravkovski from Skopje, Macedonia.

His first experiences with writing and producing music go back to 2003. After many years of experimentation and graduating as a sound engineer he was ready to let the world listen to the excellent productions. Many well received releases followed at Ovnimoon, BMSS and Geomagnetic Records. By the end of 2012 the project got noticed and signed by Dacru Records and many quality releases followed, accompanied by an 'anthology' full cd released at Ovnimoon records with some of the biggest hits, and an appearance on Armada Music in 2014. In 2017 the first proper full album â€˜Moonshineâ€™ was released at Dacru Records and turned out to be an instant hit coming in straight at #1 in Beatportâ€™s psytrance releases and staying there for over 2 weeks. Heâ€™s also known for his cooperations with Djantrix and for his progressive side-project 'Dual Resonance', which is signed to Iono Music.

name: RAJAX
label: Outrance / SenoÃ¯ Project
bio:
Depuis 2013 William Defrance aka Rajax parcourt les festivals et soirÃ©es psytrance en France. TrÃ¨s vite il commence Ã  apprendre Ã  mixer et sâ€™intÃ©resser plus sÃ©rieusement Ã  la psytrance progressive et la full on !

En 2015 il fait ses premier pas sur scÃ¨ne avec lâ€™association Outrance , trÃ¨s vite il commence Ã  jouer dans des clubs et salle de concert lyonnais avec des guests internationaux tel que Protonica / Sonic Species / Ajja / Lucas / Space tribe /Menog / Ritmo et bien dâ€™autresâ€¦.

Rajax est capable de vous faire voyager la journÃ©e avec sa psyprog rayonnante et planante 
 tout comme la nuit avec sa Full On rythmÃ©e et psychÃ©dÃ©lique !

name: HASHASHIN
label: World People Prod
bio:
= ENGLISH =

I started my musical journey as a drummer in the early 90's, before I got strongly contamined by psychedelic trance in 2005. After a while, I tried to cure myself by cooking my own beats and also quickly learn how to use turntables.

Since my first party behind the decks in 2009, I have been blasting all kind of imaginable dancefloor: forest, club, squat, beach, church, jungle, boat, castle, mountain, resort or bunker, and shared the stage with all of my favourite artists around the world. 

My debut album "Smoking Skills" was finally released in 2018 on World People Prod, after one EP, one chill album and more than 15 tracks on different VA's... So much more to come!

= FRANCAIS =

AprÃ¨s avoir tapÃ© plus de 10 ans sur une batterie et formÃ© plusieurs groupes allant du mÃ©tal au funk en passant par le hip hop, jâ€™ai fini par mâ€™intÃ©resser Ã  la synthÃ¨se sonore vers 2008. Et au mix dans la foulÃ©e. 

Câ€™est avec le collectif Bruxellois Elektro Magnetik que jâ€™ai fait mes dÃ©buts, avec un premier dj set en 2009 et mon tout premier live en 2010.

Depuis, jâ€™ai eu la chance de faire pÃ©ter mes sons sur une flopÃ©e de dance floors complÃ¨tement barrÃ©s: Ã©glise, chateau, squat, forÃªt, jungle, plage, montagne, volcan, bateau, safari parc, bunker, et de partager rÃ©guliÃ¨rement le line up avec les artistes qui mâ€™ont toujours inspirÃ©s. Ici ou lÃ : Belgique, France, Allemagne, Pays-Bas, Suisse, Portugal, Ibiza, Croatie, Italie, SlovÃ©nie, Hongrie, Russie, Roumanie, Lituanie, Mexique, Guatemala, Inde et mÃªme Luxembourg..

Câ€™est finalement chez World People Prod quâ€™est sorti monÂ premier album psy, Â«Â Smoking SkillsÂ Â», en 2018, aprÃ¨s un EP et un album Chill chez Green Tree Rec, et plus de 15 tracks sur diverses compilations.

On est sur du twilight, groovy forest, autour des 148-150 bpm, avec un flow hypnotique et des lignes de basses massives, enveloppÃ©es dans des textures qui chatouillent, tantÃ´t Ã©lastiques, tantÃ´t corrosives.

bio:
Dr fractal est un projet de trance psychÃ©dÃ©lique qui a Ã©tÃ© crÃ©Ã© en 2013. Musicien de puis de nombreuses annÃ©es, il dÃ©couvre les musiques Ã©lectroniques dont il tombe amoureux (techno , minimal , drum and bass , experimental...) mais plus particuliÃ¨rement la trance. Il a commencÃ© sur Fl Studio mais se mettra rapidement sur Ableton live ce qui lui permettra une plus grande ouverture en therme de possibilitÃ© et de live pur et dur. en 2015 il rentre chez les "Freacky Carnival Sound System"  qui l'ont beaucoup fait avancÃ© et lui on permis de faire de nombreuse rencontres dans ce milieu. En 2016 il rentre dans le label "NamastÃ© Records" ce qui lui donnera une ouverture sur d'autres artistes et qui lui permettra d'avoir plus de booking. Dr fractal is a psychedelic trance project created in 2013 after discovering the world of free party and especially for the world of trance. He began on Fl Studio and made many different styles of electronic sounds but with the time he will focus on trance.
In 2015 he started the composition on Ableton for more possibility, for the live and he goes into "Freaky Carnival Soundsystem".
In 2016 he joined Namast? Records which will give him more booking and released his first album "Fragment of the universe" in 2017.

name: PHOBOS
label: Looney Moon Records
bio:
Since always into electronic music, in 1997 dj Phobos started listening to psy-trance, going to parties and festivals all around Europe. As a dj he has played in many parties and festival around the world together with lots of artists of international fame in the world of trance. From the point of view of his musical choice, he doesnâ€™t like sticking to just one style of psy-trance, but he prefers to adapt his set to the hour, the people and the situation he finds himself in, taking always special care of the mixing. When playing during the night hours, he usually offers a Psychedelic Trance oriented style, with very psychedelic sounds which try not to degenerate into maddening noise or too dark influences; in the morning hour he will more likely choose to play more full-on underground stuff, trying to remain within the borders of psychedelics but with softer sounds, more suited for the light. Anyway he would rather play at dawn, according to him the most suitable moment of the day to enjoy his best sets. His djset is full of unreleased stuff .
He founded Looney Moon records with a group of friends in 2008 and he's is the label manager and dj of the label. Nowadays Looney Moon Records is a very weel known music label  with 5 killer compilations , 4 albums and lots of digital EP which bombed the dancefloors around the world.

label: Hadra Records
bio:
Curious Detail's music is tribal and hypnotic. A powerful rolling psytrance, a minimalism techno influence, the colors of a polymorph scoring and sound-design.
ClÃ©ment has been trained as a bass-clarinet player. He began compositions of his own at early age, attracted by the logic structures and the infinite soundscapes of psytrance. Today, he's delivering a personnal message through a dark powerful atmospherical music.

La musique de Curious Detail Ã©volue dans un style tribal et hypnotique, une psytrance soutenue et puissante, le minimalisme de la techno, les couleurs d'une orchestration et d'un sound-design polymorphes.
AprÃ¨s une formation en clarinette basse, il crÃ©a son projet Ã  17 ans attirÃ© par la multiplicitÃ© et la richesse de la psytrance. Aujourd'hui il ancre son style dans une musique sombre, atmosphÃ©rique et profondÃ©ment psychÃ©lique.

bio:

HipHop / Contemporain / Krump/ Newstyle.
He moved closer to electronic music 9 years later to explore new horizons,
new sounds

He found an originality, an wealth instrumental and a feeling of family.
That lead him to create his own music to share his energy, these feelings, through his music.

After 5 years on the Trance stage with the association Illusion Sonore,
this Freak straight from the jungle, experimenting an electric psychedelic live with forest sounds on a progressive Flow. (138 to 145 bpm ) 

Eco Jafar , grandit dans le milieu de la danse dÃ¨s ses 14 ans HipHop / Contemporain / Krump/ Newstyle. Il se rapproche vers la musique Ã©lectronique 9 ans aprÃ¨s pour explorer de nouveaux horizons,
de nouvelles sonoritÃ©s.

Il y trouve une originalitÃ© , une richesse instrumental et un univers familiale qui le mÃ¨nent Ã  crÃ©er sa propre musique afin de partager son Ã©nergie , ces Ã©motions Ã  travers Ã§a musique.

(138 / 145 Bpm)

name: SWARUP

bio:
In 1999 he moved to SÃ£o Paulo where, motivated by his
to music, mixed for love in every possible feast. He became a resident DJ of Klatu, a house known at the time as the Underground Temple of PsyTrance, and with his charisma and talent, was soon invited to play in the main events in Brazil.
Keeping up during the year 2000, it produced, for the first time, the New Year of Alto ParaÃ­so-GoiÃ¡s, the Universe Paralello, now recognized worldwide.
In this period he signed the German label Spirit Zone, having participated in the line up in the 10 year edition of the VooV Experience Festival (Germany).
In Brazil, he joined partners in the creation of Vagalume Records a seal of great influence in the current scene.
Swarup is present, bringing your good music to the biggest festivals in the world, such as Boom, Ozora, Fusion, Full Moon, Antaris, Eclipse, Groove Ataack, Geo Paradise ...
In 2010 he started producing his solo project Swarup's Brain.
The Festival Universo Paralello reaches its 12th edition in 2013 with its renowned signature and underground philosophy.

name: LUNATICA
label: Digital Om
bio:
Lunatica is the blasting psychedelic psytrance project from Miguel Solans also known as Lupin by his progressive project!
 
After producing for years under Lupin project, Miguel decided to take it level further by forming the Lunatica project. Lunatica is all about pushing boundaries between styles & its sound can be described as a fine balance between day time full on and night time psychedelic driving music.

Lunatica has arrived now to swipe the dancefloor away by monstrous maddening liquid sounds !

His integration on Hadra Records allow to confirm the musical diversity of our alternative area and we enjoy it greatly !

Le FranÃ§ais d'origine DJ Zen aka Astral Waves s'installe au QuÃ©bec au milieu des annÃ©es 90. 
Il mixe alors dans plusieurs Ã©vÃ©nements et co-organise l'un des premiers festivals psychÃ©dÃ©liques d'ampleur de la province, le lÃ©gendaire Natura.

AprÃ¨s un sÃ©jour au Costa Rica, il est de retour depuis 2002 dans la province et travaille sans cesse sur de nouvelles productions musicales pour son projet Astral Waves en plus de diriger le label Altar Records.

Personne d'influence dans la scÃ¨ne trance psychÃ©dÃ©lique au QuÃ©bec et Ã  l'Ã©chelle internationale, il est fondateur de la maison de disque Altar Records et on le connaÃ®t Ã©galement sous son projet live Astral Waves, qui apporte au Psybient une touche de deep prog avec un kick lourd et profond.

ENG:

Astral Waves is DJ Zen aka Gabriel D. from Quebec, Canada.
Originally from France, he is one of the original pioneers of the Canadian Trance scene. After several attempts in the period of 1988-1993, he moved for good to north America in 1996 with a full CD bag of Goa Trance classics. Shortly after meeting organizers in Quebec, he spinned in after hours, clubs and raves all around the place. He was also making backdrops to decorate places, hand painted t-shirts and always had a kiosk to sell CDâ€™s. After having spinning for 4 years and organizing â€œNaturaâ€ wonderful parties with his brother, he settled up his first music studio in 1999 using Reason 1.0 and Acid 3.0 to start to make music with Khetzal and make some remixes from well known bands like Juno Reactor.

DJ Zen created Altar Records in 2010. He's the manager and owner of the label since then. He does DJ and live sets on demand and does mainly all artwork and audio mastering for Altar Records. His music production as Astral Waves has gathered him some praise in the psychill scene as well as the numerous compilations he has done for Altar and diverse labels.

name: DJ ZEN

name: HALFRED
label: Merkaba Music / Shanti Planti
bio:
Halfred is the culmination of years and years of aural exploration. Originally a drummer, the Italian born sonic warrior found his roots in drumming which led him to music production, along with a degree in electronic music production at SAE, in Milan.
His eclectic approach makes it hard to categorize his music and this is partially due to the fact that his sound breaks the often repetitive mold of psy music, seamlessly taking the forms of dub, hip- hop, drum n bass, garage, and world music and while staying true to his signature sound and focused on the micro details, heâ€™s constantly experimenting with the squishy and granular side of psychedelic mid-tempo, drum n bass, dubstep, psybass and all things psychedelic.
During last years, he collaborated and remixed top notch artists like Desert Dwellers, Whitebear, Tribone, Zebbler Encanti Experience, Tryptich and had releases on labels such as Merkaba Music, Shanti Planti, Outtallectuals, Gravitas Recordings, Wakaan and more, as well as playing many festivals in the European scene, such as Modem, Lost Theory, Sonica, Create Culture, Wormhole Wednesdays and Final Fridays.

name: B BRAIN
label: Hadra
bio:
1 ans apres la sortit de la compile "DUBIQUINONE" B Brain ,
reviens une fois de plus  retourner le dance floor de la scene Alternative avec un Dj set Dub Jungle explosif !!!

name: LUPIN
label: Own Spirit
bio:
Born 24th of August in 1985 in Lleida, Spain. Miguel always has been amazed from electronic music. When he was 13 he began to entry at techno sounds, following the preferences of his older brother. Two years later his brother acquires a mixing equip, and Loopin takes the taste rapidly to the art of music mixing.

At 19 years old, Loopin decides to open Zoreks Records, the new records shop in Lleida, his city. This encourages him to submerge definitively in the world of electronic music, forcing him to know the market, the scene, the contact and many important factors to progress in his career. As he looks after Zoreks Record, he embarks in another project. At same time, is then is when he has the chance to get his first contact with psytrance world, discovering itâ€™s magic, very amazed, and slowlly getting involved into it so much that after allmost 10 years with Succes in the techno scene, a new project arrives, so at 22 years old, his progressive psytrance project borns as Lupin. Starts studing music theory, playing piano, and getting a lot of new experiences producing new music in the studio. Three years later Psyshop's main label, Parabola Music, gets interested in his music, and makes possible Lupin's 1st release, with his debut album " Siempre Secuaces ". Then his discography starts to grow up with releases in labels like Fatali Music, Yellow Sunshine Explosion, Spiral Trax, Ovnimoon Records, Synergetic, Plusquam Recs, Zero Gravity Records, Dropland Records and his live act is asked in countries like Mexico, Chile, Greece, Croatia, Belgium, Hungary, Slovenia or Spain.

name: NAVARRO
label: MAHARETTA RECORDS
bio:
Native of Montpellier / South of France.
He's one of those French talents for who music more than a passion ,is a real life style.â€¨Steff caught the electronic and djing bug with Trance music in the early 90s, switching after few years to a solid 15 years career on the international underground house and techno scene. His own style and music have been developed in the course of different encounters playing major partys and festivals on 4 continents (Singapore, Chile, Tunisia, Dubai, Brazil, Argentina, USA, Ibiza, Malaysia, Germany, Italy, Noumea, Tahiti, Bora Bora, Thailand, and the list goes on)
Behind the desks Steff is a â€œmorning act loverâ€, Playing powerful Music groovy as hell and always adapting his music to the crowd using different sounds from acidified Deep Techno to psychedelic trance .A rare blend of cutback grooves and hypnotic leads, all backed up with solid basslines.

name: DESERT DWELLERS
label: Desert Trax
bio: Desert Dwellers consists of Amani Friend and Treavor Moontribe, each of whom began their careers as independent music producers and DJs in the deserts of New Mexico and California. Coming together in the late 1990s after connecting through the Moontribe events in the deserts outside Los Angeles, today the duo enjoys a reputation as one of the most pioneering and prolific downtempo acts in the United States. Their collaborative power has resulted in numerous full-length albums, remix projects for other artists, and EPs for labels like Black Swan, Twisted, and their own label Desert Trax, among many others.

name: AMANI
label: Desert Trax
bio: Hailing from the southwest region of the United States, Amani Friend has been a unique fixture in the underground electronic music scene, seasoned by over two decades of studio production and performance. From his early days at remote desert gatherings to his constant touring of clubs and music festivals with world-renowned downtempo sensation Desert Dwellers, his career has traversed many musical styles and genres. Blending world music with cutting-edge sound design, Amani Friend has amassed an enormous catalogue between his projects Desert Dwellers, Liquid Bloom, and Variant Field. Travelling the international festival circuit and staying on the road with a jam-packed schedule, Amani continues to bring his alchemy of ancient-future psychedelia to dance floors around the globe. Equally adept at sonically fueling the spirit of large yoga classes or high-energy dance floors, Amaniâ€™s sonic offerings provide a journey into the imaginative realms of movement and sound.

name: TREAVOR MOONTRIBE
label: Desert Trax
bio: Treavor Moontribe is one of the founders of the Los Angeles based â€œMoontribe Collectiveâ€ and its legendary full moon desert gatherings. Since 1993, these events have been at the core of Southern Californiaâ€™s underground electronic music scene. Treavor established himself as one of the top DJs in LA thru these events and has since travelled the world from Brazil to Japan, Egypt, Australia, Guatemala, Costa Rica, The EU, all over North America and many more. As a Dj, itâ€™s always been the diversity thatâ€™s set him apart from his peers. His love for music spans multiple genres and his DJing reflects this as he is just as known for Techno/House as he is Psy Trance, Downtempo and various other forms of electronic music. In 2009 Treavor became the first American label DJ for Denmark based Iboga Records and released a compilation for them called Set9: Desert Selections. The compilation was an instant hit topping the psytrance chart on Beatport and the CD chart at PsyShop.com. In December 2011 Treavor joined the Neurobiotic Records family with his debut compilation called â€œNeuro:Mindedâ€ feat. Psy Trance songs from legendary artists like Dickster, Logica, The Commercial Hippies, Flip Flop, Polaris, and more.

name: TRIBONE
label: Merkaba
bio:
TRIBONE brews a sonic elixir of the purest quality music, utilising sacred bass tones and mind-bending sound design. With deep and driving bass lines accompanied by ethnic world music flavours.
Israeli native Shahar Amit provides a musical offering that is drenched in psychedelia and serves as a potent reminder of our primal roots; a tribute to our tribal heritage.
TRIBONE has enchanted dance floors all over the world such as at Lost Theory Festival, Mo:dem, and Psy-Fi Festival, The Untz Festival, Serenity Gathering, Doof Festival, and more. He is about to embark on to the European summer festival circuit, then off to his debut spring tour in Australia. He has released through Merkaba Music, Shanti Planti, Iboga Records, Desert Trax, and Street Ritual. And collaborated with artists such as Kalya Scinitlla, Desert Dwellers, Whitebear, Astropilot, AkAshA, Sixis and more.

name: LAUGHING BUDDHA
label: Nano Records
bio:
With a career spanning nearly 20 years, from the early days of the
Goa Trance scene and his involvement as co-producer on the seminal
album â€˜Cosmologyâ€™ on Transient Records as one half of Cosmosis,
Laughing Buddha developed his solo career with releases on Flying
Rhino, T.I.P. Records, Dragonfly (as Drum Druids) and other labels,
before moving on to the green and exciting pastures of the Nano
Records team.

Jez â€œBuddhaâ€ is a highly experienced Live Act and DJ and anyone who
has seen him perform will confirm that he lives up to the name of the
Laughing Buddha! He brings a unique ego-free energy to every party he
plays at, truly coming to life and invigorating the crowd with his driving
technical masterpieces and jovial stage presence.

name: SYNTHETIK CHAOS
label: Bom Shanka Music / Squarelab Music
bio:
Https://www.bomshanka.com/artists/synthetik-chaos
Synthetik Chaos
Listen on SoundCloudConnect on FaceBook
Listen to this artist
Share this page :

Synthetik Chaos is Yan, a French psytrance music producer. His influences come from different kinds of music (mainly electronical) such as: Aphex Twin, Slide, Richard Devine, Nick Taylor, Ministry, Droid Sect, Sonic Youth etc.  all these influences & many experimentations in the lab results in a combination of heavy groovy twisted basslines & electroid rhythms, psychotic soundz & bizarre noises, with always in mind to keep the dance floor as a recreation ground!

He has already released some tracks on several labels including  Pixan, Peak, Sangoma and has collaborated with some killa artists such as Electrypnose, Dirty Saffi, Illegal Machines and Asimilon.... he performed in many countries in Europe & around the globe (USA, Russia, Costa Rica, Brazil, Canada, Cyprus, Dubai, UK, Germany, Italy, Croatia etc.)  Keep watching for him via the usual channels for more appearances around the world and an album is in preparation for end of 2018 on Bom Shanka Music!

name: GAGARIN PROJECT
label: Psybient.org
bio:
Gagarin Project is a collective of conscious artists, music producers, dancers and DJ's. We explore the realms of mind expanding music. The live sets are not limited to a certain genre, juggling between ambient, modern psychedelic bass music, psytrance and techno grooves.

Gagarin Project is the international project that has evolved from the ideas of conscious living, kindness and love to other humans, our brothers and sisters. Moreover itâ€™s activity is greatly inspired by the values and traditions of ancient civilizations, universal principles of love, natural and healthy lifestyle.

name: INNAYA
label: Psybient.org
bio:
Innaya is a singer and passioned Dj with incredible collection of highly inspirational music.
She travels around the world spreading groovy beats and mystical vibes.
Her musical choice can span many genres, depending on the atmosphere.
She believes in the power of union and awareness that flows all over the trace environment.
Every her dj set is a musical expression of transcendental nature of life.
With mix from Innaya your soul will fly high to the sky.

name: FLORIAN MSK
label: Zenon Records
bio: Without limits, merging elements of techno, minimal, hypnotic and psychedelic. A massive hybrid genre projecting darkness only measurable on richter scale magnitude. Pounding the dance floor swiftly and mercilessly. Bombing it with frenzy  rhythmics. Aggressive and repetitive, almost like mental blitzkrieg. Stuff that grabs you from the guts without noise or sanguine saturation and always without boundaries.

name: ADDSIMEON
label: SomethinGroovy
bio:
Addsimeon has been playing music since 1994 as a Professional DJ across Europe at Festivals, clubs and in the fields.  After experimenting thru many genre's over the years you can hear the influences of his musical youth in his DJ Sets. The first ingredient in his sets is Bass.... Big, Fat Bass!!!   
Equally at home playing Chunky Progressive Psy or Grooving on the 'other stage' while playing a journey selection of Downtempo Electronic thru World beats and Gypsy Skankers to Upbeat Dancy Dub Belters all woven together to create the right vibe at the right time. One thing you can be sure of.... there is always a big chunk of bass and a smiley face :)

In the last couple of years the Bedroom Productions have taken a step towards the Professional as an Artist/Remixer.

Remixes/Releases so far -

Hadra Records (Dr B.Brain - Unusual Spring Remix)
Phantasm Organic Groove (JuJu Planet Dub - Dub CiCi Remix).
Ape.Choons (Calma Dub - Smoking Dub Remix)
Tip-Top Underground (JuJu Planet Dub - Dubadelica Remix)
Hadra Altervision (Addsimeon - Anablue)


In the last 20 years or so as a DJ he has shared the stage with the biggest names in the psychedelic scene and beyond and played at some of the biggest festivals - Ozora (HUN), Hadra (fr), Blackmoon (It), Glade (UK), Glastonbury (UK), Noisily (UK), Harmonic (Fr). He has been on the line up at many of the best parties in the UK - Freak Bazaar, Party Possible, Enlightenment, Chichime, Wildthings, Acid Monkey, Boogie Fest

name: KLIMENT (DNB LIVE)
label: Artmospheric/Zenon
bio: Music with a psychedelic vibe and funky solid groove, sounds about an emotional journey on the dance floor. Signed on Zenon records, Electrick dream and Blue hour sounds. Side projects: Once upon a time, Goatika, idmt.

IvÃ£ had his first contact with the psychedelic world in 1997, close to the beginning of the sykadelic movement in Portugal. His interest began through visual arts; his education was related to the plastic arts. 
Began around 1998 as a GoaTrance DJ when a friend (DJ Marte) asked him to join a small party. The Muses Rapt was the first project that captured their attention seriously, and to date his friend heart. 
With the help of most close friends in 1999, created the BlueSphere label, he co-produced some events with names like Chris Organic, Mick Chaos, Infected Mushroom and Bamboo Forest for the first time in Portugal. 
He was known for his attitude in the middle, contagious! 
Over the years his interest to softer environments grew, and he began to improve his technique as a Chillout DJ. He founded the project Tachyon with Daniel (Zen Baboon). In his sets, IvÃ£ creates an intense and emotional journey, using some sounds psychedelic, progressive, and some world music, all mixed in a very happy and relaxed. 
Since 2005 is part of the international team Electrik Dream, with the guidance of Stephan (Tajmahal). 
Through all these years, besides his work as a DJ, IvÃ£ did some work as a VJ and participated in co-production of various forms at numerous parties of nearly all the labels in Portugal.
Since 2007 until now is the manager of the Chillout/Alternative area of Freedom Festival.

Vincent, aka Pitch Blast, is a French producer from Grenoble.

After a few years spent in sound system, he discovered electronics sounds with the dubstep. This discovery will launch him in intense research, gradually leading him to electro, psytrance, and then progressive trance in 2010 with the association Hadra.

Self-taught in music as in composition, he tries many styles before creating Pitch Blast in 2012, a Psy/Progressive Trance project.

After a few gigs, he meets the Powow association, which will embark on an adventure alongside artists like Lanimal, LMX, etc. Then, after a while, he joined the association L.G.N.E (Les Gros Nazes Evolution), with which he will continue his progression and discover many other musical styles.

His compositions are a mixture of all these influences, mixing groovy basslines, techno rhythmic, scandalous lead and squeaky synths. Always borrowed in good mood, his lives as joyful as violent  will not leave you of respite.

Played several more times in the Hadra mainstage but super happy to make it back int he alternative, after 13 years and with some different music. This time gonna treat u with a glitchy experimental to techno set which i've been working on in the past few years. I find this music super inspiring and i'm gonna show you the best of the collection i digged in many years of research. This is gonna be my first techno set at a festival and i'm very much looking forward to this new experiecnce. You can expect some super fat & cunky basslines, solid production and very long and neat mixes.
